description.name: manapolygon
description.tagline: Decentraland polygon Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto polygon-mana Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Decentraland polygon directly on your website
Unique polygon/mana receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your polygon/mana wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
